snippet: After an unsustainable boom, some shrinkage in the global financial sector was inevitable, and desirable, the author writes. Besides, excluding the euro zone, cross-border capital flows are still reasonably healthy.
abstract: After an unsustainable boom, some shrinkage in the global financial sector was inevitable, and desirable, the author writes. Besides, excluding the euro zone, cross-border capital flows are still reasonably healthy.

headline.main: Honey, We Barely Shrunk the Financial System
